about_the_game:
This game reflects actual life, where you must fail so much to achieve success, complete the mission, and reach the "Joy" at the end of the goal.



You need stability, memory, and, most importantly, patience, like life. But you're lucky because you have a mighty friend called "Fairy" on your side to at least entertain you with daddy jokes amidst this painful road.



Why Memory?
Eh, you will face plenty of traps that are inevitable to avoid at first, so you have to memorize what those traps are and where those traps are.

Why Stability?
Every single move, behavior, and mistake would be saved. There might be times when you lose the entire progression just because of a simple mistake. Those times are going to make you scream, but you have to start over again and again. Otherwise, the only feeling you are going to experience is "Pain"

Why Patience?
As said before, there might be times when you lose an entire hard-gained progression just because of making a simple mistake. At these times, you should take a deep breath and continue again.



How to play it?
Well, there are just two functions: One for throwing the blob and one for picking the objects. To throw the blob, you gotta pull in the opposite direction to throw it forward. To pick objects you have to switch the function by pressing the key Z. Once you switched them, you can now see the objects that are pickable are highlighted. You just click on the object and hold it. That's it. Congrats! You can play The Way Of Joy!





GOOD LUCK while playing it!
